question:
After the migration of Gesu Daraz to the Deccan which of the following places emerged as new centres of Chisti order?
1) Malwa
2) Gujarat
3) Bengal
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Chishti Sufis were referred to as the ulema-i-duniya in the Deccan. After the migration of Gesu Daraz to the Deccan the states which emerged as new centres of Chisti order were Malwa, Gujarat, Bengal and the Deccan.
